description: Amplifies the sound around the origin.

params.name: origin
description: The location around which to amplify sound.

params.name: min_range
description: The minimum distance to begin applying falloff.

params.name: min_volume
description: The amount of amplification at max_range.

params.name: max_volume
description: The amount of amplification with in min_range.

params.name: falloff
description: The rate at which amplification falls off (0 means no fall off).
